ai-tika-vin10t0:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-tika-vin10t0:2_0: Discussion of the color of ties,
ai-tika-vin10t0:4_0: I bowed down with my head at the Buddhaâ€™s feet,
ai-tika-vin10t0:5_0: and whose teaching do, both ways.
ai-tika-vin10t0:7_0: of the monks for the benefit of nuns;
ai-tika-vin10t0:8_0: I undertake the training, in accordance with the Monastic Law, and at the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-vin10t0:11_0: Emptiness is the ultimate path, the ultimate training.
ai-tika-vin10t0:13_0: and in the training of the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-vin10t0:14_0: and the monks did not delight in heaven.
ai-tika-vin10t0:16_0: Failing to learn the Monastic Law,
ai-tika-vin10t0:17_0: My mind is scattered and diffused.
